Row.Text: Small Fish Market
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Fish.

Increases the amount of [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_GOLD] Gold produced in this City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each successive Monopoly Building provides greater benefits.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 1 Fish Resource.
